title: Yellowstone National Park: WUAMP: Air Quality and Sound Working Group
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Planning     Winter Use in Yellowstone National Park     Winter Use Adaptive Management Program     WUAMP: Air Quality and Sound Working Group                  Winter Use Adaptive Management Program: Air Quality and Soundscape       Background and Area of Focus The Soundscape and Air Quality Working Group will make recommendations to the NPS on the design of an updated monitoring strategy that measures and evaluates the impacts of oversnow vehicle use on the park's natural soundscape and on the park's air quality to ensure a cleaner and quieter park, and compliance with the new winter use sound and air emissions requirements. Meeting Agendas  Meeting #1: Meeting Notes      Meeting #1  Monitoring Strategy Other Supporting Materials
